entry.title: CISSP thoughts & notes
entry.summary: Intro The Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) certification is a well-known credential for info security professionals. For me, getting this certification was a long-term goal. I wanted to formalize my skills and gain some recognition in the cybersecurity world. I originally planned to study for the CISSP before starting my PhD, hoping to finish it while I was study...

entry.summary: Open Policy Engine (OPA) for user registration.
